title: Women's hockey umpiring
creator_credit: Bill Latto and Town and Country Productions
brief_description: Illustrates the rules for hockey as seen by the umpire. Rules and play are demonstrated during play at an international match. Made under the technical direction of the Midland Counties Women’s Hockey Association.
